goverlay -c testdata/goverlay.yaml
cmp stdout case1.txt

generate -c testdata/goverlay2.yaml
cmp stdout case2.txt

-- case1.txt --
package testdata

func _A() int {
	return 1
}

type _b struct {
	i int
}

func f() {
	var b b
}

// Code generated by goverlay; DO NOT EDIT.

func A() int {
	return 0
}

type b struct {
	_ int
}

-- case2.txt --
{
  "Replaces": {
    "./testdata/from.go": "./testdata/dist.go",
    "./testdata/from2.go": "./testdata/dist2.go"
  }
}
